Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Toledo in 1971...
Earned first career win on 4/12/1973...
Had first career hit on 4/17/1973, off Timothy Ponte (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/6/1973, off Ronald Higa (Mal)...
Injured on 6/26/1973 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 4/17/1974 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/1/1974 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.10 ERA...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Malibu on 5/11/1975, striking out 4...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/25/1975 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1975, going 22-3, 1.90 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1976, going 5-1, 1.29...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1976, going 5-2, 1.41...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1976, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1976, going 5-0, 0.85...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1976, going 27-5, 1.66 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1977, going 5-1, 1.02...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1978, going 5-1, 0.90...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1981, going 4-1, 1.03...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1983, going 3-1, 0.20...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Pitched PERFECT GAME against Manchester on 8/29/1983, striking out 5...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1983, going 14-6, 1.05 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1984, going 5-0, 0.68...
Traded from Toledo to Boston (UBA) on 7/22/1984 (Going to PIL: P K. Arent. Going to TOL: P W. Enciso)...
Injured on 7/27/1984 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/4/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $6,846,500 per year...
Injured on 4/22/1988 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/21/1989 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1990, going 3-0, 1.30...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.60 ERA...
